channel.title: Ps3
channel.description:
I have an xbox and I want a PS3. Xbox costs money for live. The playstation thing is free.. Eventually I'll be saving a lot of money from this free network service.
I don't really want a completely brand new PS3, I'm only going to use it a few times and then forget about it. So I wanted to buy a used ps3, I'd expect to find them in the $120 - $150 range, but they're in the $190 - $200 range. I can get a brand new xbox with that. A brand new PS3 is only $50 more. If I'm going to get a PS3 and I can spend $50 more to get a brand new one, I'd get a new one, not a used one. A new one with a warranty and a brand new controller and all that shit that doesn't have someone's grimy masturbation hands on.
So yeah, does anyone know where I can buy a used PS3 for a low price? Preferably amazon.com or ebay.com or some other extremely trusted site that will refund your purchase if you get fucked over.

item.title: Ps3
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:10, topic:434816”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=537533.msg3930625#msg3930625 date=1330643219]
I don’t see why people say xbox360 is better than ps3. Have you honestly played online on both? I have and I can personally say ps3 is better.
[/quote]
You can, But I can’t and I played both I had ps3, and the racists ass mutha fuckers got on my nerves and then the shit gets hacked. Lol switched to 360 afterwards, still got racists people but less people hack the whole network.[/quote]

Oh so you enjoy screaming 10 year olds who just got xbox360’s for their birthday enjoyable as well as $50 per year subscribing for shit UI and crap features.

“Less people hack on xbox360”

You make me facepalm.

I have never had any problems with PSN nor the PS3 itself. Nor have I had problems with the players. If they annoy you, there is a mute & block option.

Read full topic

tinyscape:

http://www.gumtree.com

I’m not from the UK D:

Stupit:

Or save that 50$ and buy a year of membership and get better service and everything else?

I want a PS3, I know the service is better and I know everything overall is better, I just want a used PS3, I really didn’t plan on spending over $120 on a used PS3…
